purpose: To provide a flexible and adaptable AI agent that can perform a wide range of tasks autonomously
principle: Built on large language models (LLMs) and integrates with multiple APIs for dynamic task execution
reusability: Modular design with plug-and-play components, supports API integrations for extensibility
limitations: In alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited task-specific optimizations
name: AIlice
description: AIlice is a fully autonomous, general-purpose AI agent.
highlight: Fully autonomous AI agent capable of general-purpose tasks
